title: AI-Powered Features
description: Discover how AI enhances decision-making and automates document processing

steps.title: AI-Powered Intelligence
steps.description: CivicFlow2 uses advanced AI to analyze documents, assess risk, and provide intelligent recommendations. Let's explore these powerful features.

steps.title: AI Risk Assessment
steps.description: The AI analyzes multiple factors to generate a risk score from 0-100. Lower scores indicate lower risk. The score updates automatically as new information is added.

steps.title: Risk Factor Breakdown
steps.description: See detailed factors contributing to the risk score. Each factor shows its impact (positive or negative) and explanation. This transparency helps you understand the AI's reasoning.

steps.title: Intelligent Document Processing
steps.description: AI automatically extracts key information from uploaded documents including tax returns, bank statements, and licenses. This saves hours of manual data entry.

steps.title: Extracted Data Fields
steps.description: View all data extracted from documents with confidence scores. High confidence (>90%) means the AI is very certain about the extracted value. You can verify or correct any field.

steps.title: Smart Recommendations
steps.description: The AI provides actionable recommendations based on its analysis. These suggestions help you make faster, more informed decisions while maintaining full control.

steps.title: Confidence Indicators
steps.description: Every AI insight includes a confidence score showing how certain the AI is about its analysis. Use these scores to prioritize which insights to review first.

steps.title: AI Features Tour Complete!
steps.description: You've learned how AI accelerates your workflow while maintaining accuracy and transparency. Explore the Admin Tools walkthrough to learn about system configuration.
